definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The first chapter mainly analyzes the modal words' position in the word class.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要分析了方式詞的詞類地位。

sentences.english: Can you identify the part of speech of this word?
sentences.chinese: 能說出這個單詞的詞類嗎？

sentences.english: Interjections are an active part of speech in the spoken language.
sentences.chinese: 嘆詞在口語中是相當活躍的詞類。

sentences.english: Poem text need not have empty lines inserted between their lines.
sentences.chinese: 詩詞類的文字在行與行之間不需填加空白行。

sentences.english: The multi-word verb is a special word class in English.
sentences.chinese: 多詞動詞是英語中一種特殊的詞類。

sentences.english: What part of speech does this word belong to ?
sentences.chinese: 這個單詞屬於什麼詞類？

sentences.english: Part 3 is concerned with word classes and morphology.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分有3章，談詞類和詞素。

sentences.english: In ancient Chinese, flexible use of vocabulary is a common phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 在古代漢語中，詞類活用是一種普遍的現象。

sentences.english: In addition to the syntactical functions, you must also know when and how to use the different sentence patterns.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，更需要知道何及如何運用這些不同的詞類。

sentences.english: All the entry words are given parts of speech and explanations about the meaning and usage.
sentences.chinese: 各詞條都標註詞類，按意義和用法分項詳加說明。

sentences.english: The quantifier in Chinese is one part of speech to express the quantity unit.
sentences.chinese: 現代漢語量詞是用來表示數量單位的一種詞類。

sentences.english: Adjectival modifying units are used to give more information about nouns (things).
sentences.chinese: 形容詞類的修飾單位被用作提供更多有關名詞的資訊。

sentences.english: The numeral is a part of speech which has great difference in Zhuang and Thai language.
sentences.chinese: 數詞是壯語和泰語差別較大的一個詞類。

sentences.english: But as for the internal structure of various types of words, they are much more complex than polysyllabic words.
sentences.chinese: 但具體到各詞類的內部結構，卻又比複音詞複雜得多。

sentences.english: Altogether five major sentence patterns and four kinds of positive semantic carriers are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 這集中反映在五種常用句式和四種褒義詞類上。

sentences.english: In compounds, the two lexical morphemes can be of different word classes.
sentences.chinese: 複合詞中，兩個詞彙語素可能是不同的詞類。
